name: Hooked (Tanteturner, GebackeneBanane)
description:
Use your trusty grappling hook to maneuver through this beautiful 2D Pixel art world.

The controls can be a bit unresponsive in the Web version. Please Download the Game for a better experience.

Controls:
A and D to move
Space to Jump
LMB to use the grappling hook

Art: @GebackeneBanane

Programming: @Tanteturner1

Created for the Great Autumn Game Jam 2021
